answers.answer: Steroids in any form: oral, drops, inhaled, injected can cause PSC. However so can diabetes, perhaps other drugs, smoking or drinking alcohol heavily, injury, hereditary, radiation or just plain bad luck. You will probably not be able to pin the exact cause down.JCH MD
will ESIs be a cause of PSC with in a four month period after having three injections,(ESIs).  We are needing to pinpoint the cause of this PSC for it to have accelerated so quickly...Angeliue
You have only presumptive evidence and cannot say for sure. I had a 15 year old healthy girl a neighbor of mine develop PSC and she had cataract surgery age age 16.JCH MD
